channel.title: mobile on Josh Gerdes
channel.description: Recent content in mobile on Josh Gerdes

item.title: River Raid Classic
item.description: Last fall I had some free time and decided to try my hand at game development again. I have been working in the mobile space for the past couple of years so I thought I’d leverage a language that was already in my daily rountine. So I went with JavaScript. I liked the idea of having the flexibility of running the game from a web browser and being able to run it natively with the help of a wrapper.
